1.content:
Eggman laughed maniackly as he looked at the virus he created. For to long, Sonic and the Freedom Fighters have foiled his plans over and over again. The virus was intended to take over EVERY single female, regardless of what they are. He smiled widely "Soon the virus will be released and all of them will be under my control!"He said as he laughed.

However the alarm on his base started to go off and Eggman looks around confused. "What is the meaning of this!?"Eggman said. He looked for the cause and noticed his virus has grown to strong and started to eat his way through his base's systems to escape. Eggman was angry. "NONONO STOP!"He said angry. Of course the virus broke through the last firewall and escaped. His escape caused the whole system to corrupt and shut down. "GRR This cant be happening to me!!!"he said angry

Meanwhile the virus was exploring the air as a current of electricity however it needed a host or something electronic and fast. It knew who were its targets since Eggman put all their information in it. Soon it came across the Freedom Fighter Base and looked around. In the end it decided for...
1.title: The Beggining

14.content:
It noticed a computer laying about in a room of a house and dove right into it, accessing its contents and was able to travel from computer to computer. It knew that inside one of its computer's code is an AI thats ripe for the taking. Nicole, friends of Sally Acorn and the rest of the Freedom Fighters. It soon found a firewall and realized that she is nearby.

It made quick work of the firewall though and ate right through it. It looked for Nicole only to be trapped by a bunch of firewalls. "Area Blocked"it said. "So this is what Eggman sent? A virus? I assumed he would learn."Nicole said as she started using her powers in the virtual world and started to attempt to erase the virus. It roared in annoyance. However it found a flaw in the code and ate his way through her attacks and it looks at her evilly. "Target aquired"It said as it went straight into her body. "No!"Nicole said as she got infected.
14.title: Nicole

info.brief_description: A nanobiotic virus threatens the lives of the females of mobius. Nobody is safe!
info.description:
Eggman created a virus to take over the females of mobius to get rid of sonic. But the virus becomes to dangerous and escapes. No female is safe!

Rules:
1. You can only use the sonic character of the games and comics
2. You can mention male characters but the virus wont possess them.
3. No end chapters.
4. Have good grammer and have fun.
